choose.when: select ifnull(count(*), 0) from BOOKING join B_STATE on BOOKING.S_NO = B_STATE.S_NO where CAMP_IDX = #{camp_idx} and BOOKING.S_NO = 1 and NAME like Concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select ifnull(count(*), 0) from BOOKING join B_STATE on BOOKING.S_NO = B_STATE.S_NO where CAMP_IDX = #{camp_idx} and BOOKING.S_NO = 1 and TEL like Concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

choose.otherwise: select ifnull(count(*), 0) from BOOKING join B_STATE on BOOKING.S_NO = B_STATE.S_NO where CAMP_IDX = #{camp_idx} and BOOKING.S_NO = 1

select * from BOOKING join B_STATE on BOOKING.S_NO = B_STATE.S_NO join CAMP on BOOKING.CAMP_IDX = CAMP.CAMP_IDX join SORT on BOOKING.SORT_IDX = SORT.SORT_IDX where BOOKING.CAMP_IDX = #{camp_idx} and BOOKING.S_NO = 1 and BOOKING.TEL like Concat('%',#{keyword},'%') limit #{page.startRow}, #{page.endRow}
